::KitKat::
She looked at Starscream."I will speak to you in a moment."

Battera::
She felt another bite on her wing and she screamed out.  She looked 
at the water was filling with mech fluid.  She closed her eyes and 
screamed.

She sat bold upright, screaming as she woke up from the nightmare.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream was boggled. Too many orders. Finally Darkmouse guided 
> Hell Beast out, but he was still confused. He looked at everyone.
> 
> "You. Nighteyes, someone called you. Why are you here. You came 
with 
> Megatron's men. And KitKat, what were you thinking!?! Have you 
> forgotten what Megatron did? Are you willing to forgive just to get 
> his military status? He's only going to use the council to his 
> advantage and finally complete his plan to rule all Predacons! You 
> know tht\at! And now that Arachnia, Destructor and I are on the 
> council, you can not just make a decision like that on your own! I 
> know I said that I would leave many of the decisions to you and 
> Arachnia, but bringing the traitor into the fold? We all need to 
> agree on that, and I certainly do not. He wants you dead, and he'll 
> get it if you bring him here!"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois felt a jolt. The cable had been severed. The portal to 
> Battera's mind closed. But he could tell that her dream was still 
> going on, but in her own head. But if she's not in his, that 
means....
> 
> Suddenly a bright light apperaed, and their was Battera, or atleast 
> in his dream, and she shot at the Alliance. As soon as they were 
hit, 
> they evaportated. The Alliance programming had been defeated. His 
> cross disspapeared. And than their was darkness.
> 
> Vulois opened his eyes.
